T01D1132:80b-1: aarya manydzu shr'i bha n'a ra ka k'a ru na sto tra /
T01D1132:80b-3: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la bstod pa //
T01D1132:80b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1132:80b-5: nyes pa ma lus pa rnams rab bsal zhing //
T01D1132:80b-6: thub pa'i grags pas 'gro ba ma lus khyab //
T01D1132:80b-7: dpal ldan rab tu brtan pa'i sku mnga' ba //
T01D1132:80b-8: dpal ldan khyed la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T01D1132:80b-9: bos shing bos shing 'gro ba ma lus pa //
T01D1132:80b-10: phongs pa 'di dag kun las khyed skyob mdzad //
T01D1132:80b-11: bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur kyang dman khyed ces //
T01D1132:80b-12: ci yi phyir na ngos par sel mi mdzad //
T01D1132:80b-13: bcom ldan khyod ni rtag par thams cad la //
T01D1132:80b-14: rnam pa kun du thams cad gsol grag na //
T01D1132:80b-15: bdag la mthong ba tsam yang ma stsal bas //
T01D1132:80b-16: de phyir bdag ni shin tu skal dman lags //
T01D1132:80b-17: yon tan ldan zhing nyes pa sel mdzad pa //
T01D1132:81a-1: kun skyob par brtson gyur na //
T01D1132:81a-2: bdag blo khyed la mngon du zhen na yang //
T01D1132:81a-3: phongs pas gdungs pa nyid du ci phyir 'gyur //
T01D1132:81a-4: thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pa khyed kyi ni //
T01D1132:81a-5: pad+ma lta bu dag pa'i spyan gnyis kyis //
T01D1132:81a-6: 'gro ba phan par mdzad kyang bdag sdug par //
T01D1132:81a-7: ma gzigs pa ni kyee ma sdug bsngal lo //
T01D1132:81a-8: khyed kyis yid 'jigs dbugs 'byin mdzad pa yi //
T01D1132:81a-9: phyag gi pad+ma ring du rtag rkyong yang //
T01D1132:81a-10: skal nyes pa yi tsha bas de yang ni //
T01D1132:81a-11: thag ring du ni mi snang nyid du 'gyur //
T01D1132:81a-12: khyed kyi snyan ni ma nyams gtsang ba dag / gnyis kyis kyang ni lus la sdug bsngal gyis //
T01D1132:81a-13: gzir te spyan sngar 'o dod 'bod gyur kyang //
T01D1132:81a-14: bdag gi dman pa ci phyir gsan ma gyur //
T01D1132:81a-15: rnam pa kun du thugs rjes drangs khyed kyis //
T01D1132:81a-16: dmyal bar song ba'i 'gro rigs bde mdzad na //
T01D1132:81a-17: sdig can bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis ni //
T01D1132:81a-18: thugs rje de yang brtse ba mi mnga' gyur //
T01D1132:81a-19: 'jig rten dman la phan par mdzad pa yi //
T01D1132:81a-20: khyod la gzhon nu'i rol pa 'di mnga' na //
T01D1132:81a-21: gang 'dir bdag ni sdug bsngal gyis gzir kyang //
T01D1132:81a-22: bskyab par mi mdzad sdig can bsam pas nyes //
T01D1132:81a-23: 'di na sdug bsngal can ni gang yin zhes //
T01D1132:81a-24: glen gang gang gis phun tshogs zad gyur ces //
T01D1132:81a-25: de ltar rnam par rgyu zhing skyob mdzad kyang //
T01D1132:81a-26: bdag phongs ma gzigs kye ma ngo mtshar che //
T01D1132:81a-27: gang zhig la ni tshig sbyin gang zhig la //
T01D1132:81a-28: 'phral du phun tshogs rgya chen sbyin bya zhes //
T01D1132:81a-29: de ltar brtson pa khyed kyi mkhyen rab kyis //
T01D1132:81a-30: ci yi phyir na bdag la skyob mi mdzad //
T01D1132:81a-31: khyed la dad par gyur pa su mi bde //
T01D1132:81a-32: khyed dang bsod nams dman pa zhig ma mchis //
T01D1132:81a-33: bdag ni khyed la dad kyang sdug bsngal bar //
T01D1132:81a-34: ci phyir gyur ces ngo mtshar rnam par 'khrungs //
T01D1132:81a-35: sdug bsngal gcod mdzad sman pa chen po ni //
T01D1132:81a-36: gang de khyed kyang bdag la spong mdzad na //
T01D1132:81a-37: bsod nams bcom pa bdag gis gzhan su la //
T01D1132:81a-38: skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba khyed kyis gsungs ;
T01D1132:81a-39: /'gro la rtag tu bu gcig 'dra ba yi //
T01D1132:81a-40: brtse ba'i thugs ni mnga' zhing sgrol spyod pa //
T01D1132:81a-41: khyed kyang gal te bdag gnod mi sel na //
T01D1132:81a-42: de tshe bdag ni mgon med bcom pa lags //
T01D1132:81a-43: bcom ldan khyed ni dran pa tsam gyis ni //
T01D1132:81a-44: 'gro la 'bras bu mnyam med kun stsol na //
T01D1132:81b-0: bdag ni @81b bsnyen bkur bgyid kyang bdag gi phyogs //
T01D1132:81b-1: rnam pa kun du phyi bshol ci phyir mdzad //
T01D1132:81b-2: de ltar smre gsol ba yis khyod yon tan //
T01D1132:81b-3: cha tsam brjod las bdag gis dge bsags pa //
T01D1132:81b-4: gang yin des ni 'gro la bsod nams dag / rgya cher rang bzhin grub pa'i bum pa bzang //
T01D1132:81b-5: yid bzhin nor bu lta bu gzugs sku yi //
T01D1132:81b-6: zhabs gnyis rgyu ba'i dpag bsam 'dra ba yi //
T01D1132:81b-7: khyod kyi gzhon nu'i lus su bdag gyur cing //
T01D1132:81b-8: skye ba kun du bdag po nyid gyur cig /
T01D1132:81b-9: rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi snying rje la
T01D1132:81b-10: bstod pa slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad
